name: tensor2metric
description:
Generate maps of tensor-derived parameters.



References:

Basser, P. J.; Mattiello, J. & Lebihan, D. MR diffusion tensor spectroscopy and imaging. Biophysical Journal, 1994, 66, 259-267

Westin, C. F.; Peled, S.; Gudbjartsson, H.; Kikinis, R. & Jolesz, F. A. Geometrical diffusion measures for MRI from tensor basis analysis. Proc Intl Soc Mag Reson Med, 1997, 5, 1742
author: Thijs Dhollander (thijs.dhollander@gmail.com) & Ben Jeurissen (ben.jeurissen@uantwerpen.be) & J-Donald Tournier (jdtournier@gmail.com)

inputs.name: tensor
inputs.description: the input tensor image.

inputs.name: adc
inputs.description: compute the mean apparent diffusion coefficient (ADC) of the diffusion tensor. (sometimes also referred to as the mean diffusivity (MD))

inputs.name: fa
inputs.description: compute the fractional anisotropy (FA) of the diffusion tensor.

inputs.name: ad
inputs.description: compute the axial diffusivity (AD) of the diffusion tensor. (equivalent to the principal eigenvalue)

inputs.name: rd
inputs.description: compute the radial diffusivity (RD) of the diffusion tensor. (equivalent to the mean of the two non-principal eigenvalues)

inputs.name: cl
inputs.description: compute the linearity metric of the diffusion tensor. (one of the three Westin shape metrics)

inputs.name: cp
inputs.description: compute the planarity metric of the diffusion tensor. (one of the three Westin shape metrics)

inputs.name: cs
inputs.description: compute the sphericity metric of the diffusion tensor. (one of the three Westin shape metrics)

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: compute the selected eigenvalue(s) of the diffusion tensor.

inputs.name: vector
inputs.description: compute the selected eigenvector(s) of the diffusion tensor.

inputs.name: num
inputs.description: specify the desired eigenvalue/eigenvector(s). Note that several eigenvalues can be specified as a number sequence. For example, '1,3' specifies the principal (1) and minor (3) eigenvalues/eigenvectors (default = 1).

inputs.name: modulate
inputs.description: specify how to modulate the magnitude of the eigenvectors. Valid choices are: none, FA, eigval (default = FA).

inputs.name: mask
inputs.description: only perform computation within the specified binary brain mask image.

inputs.name: info
inputs.description: display information messages.

inputs.name: quiet
inputs.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

inputs.name: debug
inputs.description: display debugging messages.

inputs.name: force
inputs.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

inputs.name: nthreads
inputs.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

inputs.name: config
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

type.name: config
type.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: help
inputs.description: display this information page and exit.

inputs.name: version
inputs.description: display version information and exit.

output-files.name: adc
output-files.description: compute the mean apparent diffusion coefficient (ADC) of the diffusion tensor. (sometimes also referred to as the mean diffusivity (MD))

output-files.name: fa
output-files.description: compute the fractional anisotropy (FA) of the diffusion tensor.

output-files.name: ad
output-files.description: compute the axial diffusivity (AD) of the diffusion tensor. (equivalent to the principal eigenvalue)

output-files.name: rd
output-files.description: compute the radial diffusivity (RD) of the diffusion tensor. (equivalent to the mean of the two non-principal eigenvalues)

output-files.name: cl
output-files.description: compute the linearity metric of the diffusion tensor. (one of the three Westin shape metrics)

output-files.name: cp
output-files.description: compute the planarity metric of the diffusion tensor. (one of the three Westin shape metrics)

output-files.name: cs
output-files.description: compute the sphericity metric of the diffusion tensor. (one of the three Westin shape metrics)

output-files.name: value
output-files.description: compute the selected eigenvalue(s) of the diffusion tensor.

output-files.name: vector
output-files.description: compute the selected eigenvector(s) of the diffusion tensor.
